glsa.title: hostapd and wpa_supplicant: Denial of Service
glsa.synopsis: A vulnerability in hostapd and wpa_supplicant could lead to a Denial of Service condition.

background.p: wpa_supplicant is a WPA Supplicant with support for WPA and WPA2 (IEEE 802.11i / RSN).
hostapd is a user space daemon for access point and authentication servers.

description.p: A vulnerability was discovered in hostapd’s and wpa_supplicant’s eap_server/eap_server_pwd.c and eap_peer/eap_pwd.c files.

impact.p: An attacker could cause a possible Denial of Service condition.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.
